data.questText: We know the Chimera invasion came from the East, so despite the hostility of the spirits I think at least one druid tried to lead some of the people of Sagila to safety in this awful place. Search for clues. Perhaps a Bramble Tree caught the clothing of a refugee.
data.completeText: These scraps of cloth aren't normal garb for a druid, and so they must be from victims of the invasion trying to escape.
